moribund.translation[0].definitions[0].d: a moribund organization, industry etc is no longer active or effective and may be coming to an end
moribund.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The region’s heavy industry is still inefficient and moribund.
A cut in interest rates will help the country’s moribund housing market.
moribund.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The patient was moribund by the time the doctor arrived.
